title: Live in your dream home at Walden Brook! 1 Bd/1 ba, 732 SqFt
posting_body: ['Walden Brook', 'Bedroom: 1 | Bathroom: 1', 'Square Footage: 732 sq ft', 'Monthly Rent: $1405', 'show contact info', 'Community Description', "With a variety of floor plans to choose from, we're certain there's one that's just right for you.", 'Browse our one, two, and three bedroom floor plans.', 'Community Amenities', '❖ BBQ/Picnic Area', '❖ Conference Room', '❖ Courtyard', '❖ Fitness Center', '❖ Gameroom', '❖ Gated entry', '❖ Maintenance on site', '❖ Multi Use Room', '❖ Playground', '❖ Resort Style Swimming Pool w/Cabana', '❖ Car Care Center', '❖ Detached garages', '❖ Lake view', '❖ Online Services', '❖ Package Service', '❖ Planned Social Activities', '❖ Property Manager on Site', '❖ Public Transportation', '❖ Sundeck', '❖ Wi-Fi at Pool and Clubhouse', 'Unit Features', '❖ Air Conditioning', '❖ Dining Room', '❖ Dishwasher', '❖ Disposal', '❖ Extra Storage', '❖ Handrails', '❖ Oven', '❖ Patio or Balcony', '❖ Range', '❖ Trash Compactor', '❖ 9 foot ceiling', "❖ Children's activity center", '❖ Contemporary floor plans', '❖ Deck', '❖ Fully equipped modern kitchens', '❖ Hardwood Floors', '❖ Large walk-in closets', '❖ Recreation Room', '❖ Spacious 1, 2 & 3 Bedrooms', '❖ Views', 'Contact Information', 'Visit Us:', '100 Walden Brook Drive', 'Lithonia, GA 30038', 'show contact info', 'Hours:', 'Mon - Fri: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM', 'Sat: 10:00 AM - 5:00 PM', 'Sun: 1:00 PM - 5:00 PM', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'Additional Details', 'Pet Policy:', 'A maximum of 2 pet per unit shall be accepted.', 'The pet fee is $300 Non-Refundable per pet.', 'A pet addendum must be completed and pet fees must be paid prior to moving in.', 'If there is more than one pet per unit, the combined weight of the 2 pets cannot exceed 50lbs.', 'Lease Terms:', '6-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month', 'Management Company:', 'Ventron Management', 'Price is subject to change without prior notice', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', '02980EC4E78842']
